data.title: The Cult Classic Horror Show: 314: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
data.meta_description: "America isn't ready to accept a gay Mexican chicken sandwich." Join us as we discuss Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead! Possibly the most outrageous movie we've ever covered! We talk about the 80 volunteers that worked on the production, the high tension on set, Lloyd Kaufman's crazy directing style and MUCH MORE!
data.text:
Info

The Cult Classic Horror Show

Conversations you’ve always wanted to have about the cult classic horror movies you love. Includes exclusive interviews with actors, directors, super fans and anyone else we can get our hands on! We dig deep and divulge all the dirty "behind the scenes” secrets for the nerdiest of conversations.

Facebook Twitter RSS Feed Subscribe in Apple Podcasts

"America isn't ready to accept a gay Mexican chicken sandwich." Join us as we discuss Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead! Possibly the most outrageous movie we've ever covered! We talk about the 80 volunteers that worked on the production, the high tension on set, Lloyd Kaufman's crazy directing style and MUCH MORE!
